name: Hazard Pay (KOTOB)
description:
Downloading highly recommended! WebGL build is functional, but is missing some effects, and MUST BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN

Hazard Pay

You're an engineer at "Totally Not Evil Co". Due to budget cuts, the company's world domination plans have been moved up to 5 days from now. You must build and test your evil robot before that time is up, so it can take over the world! Don't expect much funding, though.

Made in a month (albeit while procrastinating for most of that time) for the 2023 Boss Rush Jam.

Unity HTML builds can be weird sometimes, if it's not working for whatever reason, download the Windows build and try to run that instead.
